price: Dan apakah mereka tidak memperhatikan bahwa sesungguhnya Allah yang menciptakan langit dan bumi dan Dia tidak merasa payah karena menciptakannya, kuasa menghidupkan orang-orang mati? Ya, (bahkan) sesungguhnya Dia Maha Kuasa atas segala sesuatu.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَلَمۡ يَعۡيَ بِخَلۡقِهِنَّ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰۚ بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw anna al-laha alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa walam yaʿya bikhalqihinna biqādirin ʿalā an yuḥ'yiya al-mawtā balā innahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
